snippet: After almost a year’s delay, the Islanders and the Devils will play the first N.H.L. game at the Barclays Center in Brooklyn on Sept. 21. The Isles are scheduled to move to the Brooklyn arena in 2015.
abstract: After almost a year’s delay, the Islanders and the Devils will play the first N.H.L. game at the Barclays Center in Brooklyn on Sept. 21. The Isles are scheduled to move to the Brooklyn arena in 2015.

headline.main: Islanders Schedule First Game at Barclays Center
